name: Pasha
description: Pasha is a Unique crypto currency which allows investors to take an active role in saving Human being and Animal lives. While there are million of orphans and animals world wide, a most of them are disproportionately f o u n d in developing countries and conflict zones. These regions are in a constant battle to access the resources, they so desperately need in order for every child to have food, shelter, and hope for the future.
